Posts.Content: I am a 35 year old male in march I found a lump next to my right breast. Until then I didn’t think that a man could get breast cancer. I have had my right breast removed and am going through chemo and I have 2 more to go. The one thing that I want is to talk to more men that have gone through this. If there is any one else please write me. my email is --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html --- thank you
Posts.Title: Male Breast Cancer
